description: Supports spell skills that are not triggered. Instead of casting that spell, you will summon a totem that casts the spell for you.
mods: Supported Skills will summon a Totem which uses that Skill
Spells Cast by Totem have 30% less Cast Speed

mtx.description: Your Spell or Ballista totem becomes a coloured totem that has carved tiki designs.
mtx.name: Tiki Totem Skin

mtx.description: Your Spell or Ballista totem becomes a carved stone totem with two faces.
mtx.name: Olmec Totem Skin

mtx.description: Your Spell or Ballista totem becomes an eagle guardian.
mtx.name: Eagle Guardian Totem Skin

mtx.description: Your Spell or Ballista totem becomes an ancient ziggurat.
mtx.name: Ziggurat Totem Skin

mtx.description: Your Spell or Ballista totem becomes a golden dragon.
mtx.name: Dragon Totem Skin

mtx.description: Your Spell or Ballista totem becomes an Arcane Tome.
mtx.name: Arcane Tome Totem Skin

mtx.description: Your Spell or Ballista totem becomes a Pylon of Pain.
mtx.name: Pylon of Pain Totem Skin

mtx.description: Your Spell or Ballista totem becomes a twisted skull totem.
mtx.name: Twisted Skull Totem Skin

name: Spell Totem Support
